title: SQUIRREL NUT ZIPPERS CHRISTMAS CARAVAN
description: Inspired by 1920s jazz, klezmer, and old-time music, this joyous show celebrates the season with heartwarming ballads, boisterous dance tunes, alternative holiday classics, and so much more. An unforgettable night of music from this Platinum-selling band!
address: Symphony Space, 2537 Broadway & 95th Street, NY, NY 10025
cost: Use code SKINT10 for $10 off full-price tickets
